The microwave site maintenance cost figure in this report has
been shown as $1,000 per unit per year. This figure includes tubes,
parts, building upkeep, road maintenance, tower maintenance, and all
the miscellaneous costs required to keep the system in operation.
Division of operating cost among states has been allocated
according to the number of 2 way primary system hops located in each
state. Depreciation is in accordance with primary equipment cost
allocated to each state. We feel that the operating cost estimates
shown are conservative for a system of this size.
